import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../css/Navbar.css"; function Navbar() { const [isActive, setActive] = useState("/"); const [isMobileOpen, setMobileOpen] = useState(false); let url = window.location.href; let i = url.lastIndexOf("/") + 1; let path = url.slice(i); console.log(path) if (isActive !== path) { setActive(path); } return (
  • setActive("/")} > Home
  • setActive("studies")} > My Learning
  • setActive("contact")} > Contact Me
  • setActive("resume")} > Resume

  • setActive("/")} > Home

  • setActive("contact-me")} > Contact Me

); } export default Navbar;
